arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Kompany admires the Parisian project, calling it “a revolutionary idea”
arts.sum: This Tuesday at 9 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes in the 4th matchday of the 2025–2026 UEFA Champions League. Ahead of the clash, Bayern coach Vincent Kompany spoke in a press conference about the match and his view of the Parisian side. Kompany: “It’s a […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Paris lineup according to the press: Ruiz or Zaïre-Emery?
arts.sum: This Tuesday, on Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face second-place Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). Ahead of this match, the press tried to guess the team that Parisian coach Luis Enrique will field. Le Parisien (4-3-3) – Kvaratskhelia – Mayulu – Barcola […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs. Bayern Munich: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The two European giants have yet to drop points in the Champions League this season.

arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain vs. Bayern Munich: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and teams news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich put their record-breaking winning start to 2025/26 on the line against UEFA Champions League holders Paris Saint-Germain at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday (kick-off: 9pm CET). Bayern are six-time Champions League/ European Cup winners, most recently winning the competition in 2019/20 after beating PSG in the final.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Paris Lineup announced with Mayulu
arts.sum: This Tuesday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 pm, CET). On Monday, RMC Sport predicted the PSG starting lineup. Barcola – Mayulu – Kvaratskhelia Ruiz or Zaïre-Emery- Vitinha – Neves Mendes – Pacho – Marquinhos – Hakimi Chevalier. […]

arts.ttl: Hakimi opens up: dreams, Champions League and PSG vs Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Achraf Hakimi, the 26-year-old right-back for Paris Saint-Germain and Morocco, spoke to PSG TV. He shared his thoughts on last season’s Champions League victory, his current status, his objectives for the future, and the upcoming match against Bayern Munich this Tuesday (Matchday 4) at the Parc des Princes at 9 p.m CET. Hakimi: “I’m happy […]

arts.ttl: PREVIEW | PSG vs Bayern Munich: Team news and predicted XIs
arts.sum: Bayern Munich travel to the French capital to face holders Paris Saint-Germain on Matchday four of the Champions League. Vincent Kompany’s side, along with PSG, are two of the favourites…

arts.ttl: PSG forward Dembélé is fit to face Bayern Munich in the Champions League
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique says Ousmane Dembélé is fit enough to face Bayern Munich in the Champions League on Tuesday. But Ousmane is fit, he has done all the training sessions in the last two weeks, and he has taken part in the last two matches,” Luis Enrique said.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich predictions: Les Parisiens to end Bavarians' perfect record
arts.sum: James Mason says Paris Saint-Germain can put an end to Bayern Munich's perfect season when they clash in the League Phase of the Champions League on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 4 Predictions: PSG to end Bayern winning run
arts.sum: Warren Ashurst has provided a correct score prediction for all 18 games on Matchday Four of the Champions League
